definition: at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at
see 早知今日何必當初|早知今日何必当初[zao3 zhi1 jin1 ri4 he2 bi4 dang1 chu1]
pinyin: ji4 you3 jin1 ri4 he2 bi4 dang1 chu1

definition: if I (you, she, he...) had known it would come to this, I (you, she, he...) would not have acted thus (idiom)/to regret vainly one's past behavior
pinyin: zao3 zhi1 jin1 ri4 he2 bi4 dang1 chu1

sentences.english: Albert Einstein's parents feared he was sub-normal.
sentences.chinese: 愛因斯坦的父母當初曾經擔心他發育不正常。

sentences.english: All the young primates, in fact, developed the very disease the weakened virus was supposed to prevent.
sentences.chinese: 這些小猴全部發生了當初用弱性疫苗所要預防的疾病。

sentences.english: They bid farewell to the original suffer hunger and cold days.
sentences.chinese: 他們告別了當初飢寒交迫的日子。

sentences.english: They had been told only one month but drag the half-year cycle drawback.
sentences.chinese: 當初被告知只需一個月的退稅週期卻拖了近半年。

sentences.english: Like the time he brought home the electric range.
sentences.chinese: 就像當初爸爸爲家裏買電熱爐具的時候。

sentences.english: Would I still be at home if I had been housebroken ?
sentences.chinese: 如果當初我沒有在家裏大小便，你會不會讓我留下來？

sentences.english: Why had she married into the Chiang family?
sentences.chinese: 當初她爲什麼嫁到姜家來？

sentences.english: All the atmosphere of unstained affection would be gone out of it now.
sentences.chinese: 所有當初那種純潔的親愛空氣，現在都要沒有了。

sentences.english: When the MacArthur hit, I was behind in the rent.
sentences.chinese: 當初獲得麥克阿瑟獎時，我還有租金要還。

sentences.english: Why did he rebuild Shuihui Garden?
sentences.chinese: 那當初爲什麼會修復水繪園呢？

sentences.english: It was she who awaited for his returning every night with the light on as tonight.
sentences.chinese: 當初她就是這樣夜夜亮着燈等他歸來的。

sentences.english: Why did you choose to go to law school?
sentences.chinese: 你當初爲什麼會選擇法學院呢？

sentences.english: That was the reason for withdrawing from East of Suez in the first place.
sentences.chinese: 那就是當初撤出蘇伊士以東的最首要的原因。

sentences.english: I had borrowed 500,000 yuan, and the term was 25 years.
sentences.chinese: 我當初借了銀行50萬元，還款期是25年。

sentences.english: At first, the study group proceeded as the teacher had promised.
sentences.chinese: 起初，學習小組就像老師當初保證的那樣進行着。

sentences.english: He thought of his paper as a pulpit.
sentences.chinese: 他當初把這份報紙當做一個講道壇。

definition: in those days/then/in those years/during that time
once/already/former/previously/ever/(past tense marker used before verb or clause)
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
(in the) past/former/previous/to go over/to pass by
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
